    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Uses of ammonia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebrauch des Ammoniaks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisations de l'ammoniaque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usos da amônia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usi di ammoniaca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήσεις της αμμωνίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicaciones del amoníaco</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This pie graph shows the distribution of uses of ammonia. As seen in the graph, ammonia is primarily used as fertilisers.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fertiliser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Haber process</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Tortediagramm zeigt die Verteilung des 
Gebrauches des Ammoniaks. Wie in das Diagramm gesehen, wird 
Ammoniak hauptsächlich als Düngemittel benutzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique de pâté en croûte montre la 
distribution des utilisations de l'ammoniaque. Comme vu dans le 
graphique, l'ammoniaque est principalement utilisée comme engrais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico da torta mostra a distribuição dos
usos da amônia. Como visto no gráfico, a amônia é usada 
primeiramente como fertilizantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico della torta mostra la distribuzione
degli usi di ammoniaca. Come visto nel grafico, l'ammoniaca 
soprattutto è usata come fertilizzanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση πιτών εμφανίζει τη διανομή 
των χρήσεων της αμμωνίας. Όπως βλέπει στη γραφική 
παράσταση, η αμμωνία χρησιμοποιείται πρώτιστα ως λιπάσματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico de la empanada muestra la 
distribución de aplicaciones del amoníaco. Según lo visto en 
el gráfico, el amoníaco se utiliza sobre todo como fertilizantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ammoniak</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Düngemittel</string>
          </keyword>
